id: Primer: Made for digital creators powered by Notion & Super
name: Primer: Made for digital creators powered by Notion & Super
description: Primer is a flexible and customizable Super template designed for creators. With a modern aesthetic and a responsive layout, your work will look great on any screen. And the best part — make Primer unique by choosing your own custom background, text, and accent colors.Primer Demo Site ↗Primer is designed and built by Matt Downey — a digital creator at the intersection of design, crypto, and mindset.
